text: Oda Senior High School (ODASCO) is a co-educational second-cycle institution in Akim Oda, situated in the Birim Central Municipal District in the Eastern Region of Ghana. == History == The school was established in 1960 with only 95 students. == Enrollment == As of 2015, Oda Senior High School had a student popuplation of 2,242 students. == Headmasters == {| class="wikitable" |+ !Name !Tenure |- |David Afosah-Anim |2008 - 2015 |- |Francis K. Appiah |2015- present |- | | |} == Alumni == * Paa Kwesi Bekoe Amissah Arthur, former vice president of Ghana * Akua Sarpong-Ayisa, Ghanaian entrepreneur * Sammy Flex, journalist * Adarkwah Evans, Entrepreneur ==References== Category:High schools in Ghana Category:Education in Accra Category:Educational institutions established in 1960 Category:Schools in Africa Category:Public Schools in Ghana
title: Oda Senior High School
